title: Minimalist Watch Straps
shortDescription: Custom straps for your favourite watches — comfy, chic.
description: Handstitched watch straps using reclaimed fabrics and vegetable-tanned leather. Each strap is tailored to last and softened with wear.

title: Chai Spice Blend
shortDescription: Cozy chai mix — steep, sip, smile.
description: A balanced mix of cardamom, cinnamon, ginger and cloves — perfect for morning routines or rainy-day vibes.

title: Rose & Clay Soap
shortDescription: Gentle rose-scented soap for glowing skin.
description: Cold-processed soap with rosehip oil and pink clay. Calming, mildly exfoliating, and great for sensitive skin.

title: Handpainted Clay Earrings
shortDescription: Lightweight, colorful, and totally unique.
description: Each pair is hand-shaped and painted — no two are the same. Inspired by traditional motifs with a modern twist.

title: Saffron Cardamom Cookies
shortDescription: Buttery cookies with a warm spice hit.
description: Perfect for gifting or serving with tea — made in small batches with premium saffron and freshly ground cardamom.

title: Upcycled Fabric Tote
shortDescription: Sturdy totes made from leftover sari cloth.
description: Each tote supports local weavers — spacious, washable, and absolutely instagrammable.

title: Herbal Facial Steam
shortDescription: Ritual steam blends for radiant skin.
description: Aromatic blends of neem, tulsi and lemongrass — just add hot water for a refreshing facial ritual.

title: Mini Masala Jars
shortDescription: Little jars of big flavour.
description: Curated mini jars of everyday masalas — perfect for trying new flavours or gifting to foodie friends.

title: Handwoven Bracelet
shortDescription: Bright, comfy bracelets handwoven in small batches.
description: Soft-thread bracelets that stack well — made using traditional hand-loom techniques and natural dyes.

title: Pepper & Lime Chutney
shortDescription: Zesty chutney to brighten up meals.
description: Small-batch chutney with fresh peppers and lime — tangy, bright, and great with snacks.

title: Oat & Honey Soap
shortDescription: Soothing soap for daily use.
description: Oatmeal and honey bar soap that cleanses gently and soothes dry skin.

title: Brass Hoop Set
shortDescription: Timeless hoops for every day.
description: Hand-formed brass hoops with a subtle hammered finish — lightweight and durable.

title: Smoked Paprika Blend
shortDescription: A smoky seasoning for roasting and grilling.
description: A balanced paprika blend with a touch of smokiness — great for veg and meat alike.

title: Calendula Face Oil
shortDescription: Lightweight oil for calm, nourished skin.
description: Cold-pressed oils infused with calendula to soothe and hydrate — best used at night.

title: Leather Keychain
shortDescription: Small leather keepsakes that age beautifully.
description: Vegetable-tanned leather keychains hand-stitched and stamped with minimalist motifs.

title: Turmeric Granola
shortDescription: Golden granola with warming spices.
description: Crunchy granola with turmeric, coconut, and toasted oats — sprinkle over yoghurt for a bright start.

title: Mint & Neem Soap
shortDescription: Cooling soap with neem and mint.
description: Refreshing bar made with neem oil and peppermint for a cooling, clarifying wash.

title: Beaded Anklet
shortDescription: Playful anklets for sunny days.
description: Delicate beaded anklets strung on durable thread with optional charms.

title: Citrus Pickle
shortDescription: Bright pickle that pairs with curries.
description: Small-batch citrus pickle, fermented lightly for a tangy kick — classic with rice dishes.

title: Chamomile Night Balm
shortDescription: A calming balm for bedtime rituals.
description: A gentle balm with chamomile and lavender to calm the senses before sleep.
